Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Louie
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
An armoured transport aircraft, the Louie is a robust and agile mobile mode of transportation. Doesn’t require a landing strip and won’t fall apart at the first sign of fire.

A relatively general purpose helicopter, it has both excellent cargo and passenger capacity. Has some armour for an aircraft, allowing it to deploy and extract from hot zones.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Pilot x1, Passenger x5
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
